p.s: Simple exchanges can break down walls between us an often discussed topic by a lot of politicians which I will take a stand on in the following.
To begin with I would like to clearly position myself next to Obama who phrases the mentioned quote.
I think losing our little differences is the only way our world can move further.
As Michelle Obama says intercultural exchanges are the key to success.
Secondly I believe that crosscultural little exchanges are what bring varietysvarieties of food for example.
It can be discussed whether it's delicious or not and now it's made which is a great way to lose problems.
To sum up I would like to say how right Obama is when he formulates such a saying.
Simple exchanges as food e.g. are what makes us lose our differences.
